SEARCH
Module com.example.loginpage
Package com.example.loginpage.module.users

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.loginpage.module.users.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
FavouritesObserver, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Client
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable, FavouritesObserver
An abstract base class that represents a user in the system. This class implements the serialisation functionality Each user has a unique identifier, profile details, and a list of books they have recently interacted with or marked as favourites. The application provides methods for managing user data and behaviour related to book management.
See Also:

      name - User's full name
      email - User's email address
      phone - User's phone number
      password - User's account password
      isAdmin - Flag indicating whether the user has admin privileges
